data.title: Me Without You
meta_keywords: Me Without You how to watch
Me Without You where to watch
data.meta_description: Two best friends grow up on the Isle of Wight and in Brighton in the 1970s and 1980s. Watch now!
data.text:
"Goldbacher effectively explores the love-hate and competitive nature of close female relationships with wit, evocative staging, and a whimsical soundtrack."

BBC.com

"Offers much to enjoy ... and a lot to mull over in terms of love, loyalty and the nature of staying friends."

Hollywood Reporter

"There is no substitute for on-screen chemistry, and when Friel pulls the strings that make Williams sink into melancholia, the reaction in Williams is as visceral as a gut punch."

Chicago Tribune
